attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dolphines in japan are being brutally killed every year for no reason at all. a couple of dolphines are being trained for entertainment purposes by sea world and other aquariums around the world. there has been a film made called the cove which everyone should watch. the killing of a mammal so beutifull is absoloutley disgussting. it should be stopped.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
